channel.title: Neo4j on Brett Randall Taylor
channel.description: Recent content in Neo4j on Brett Randall Taylor

item.title: Non-Verbal Communication In Leadership
item.description: As a leader, you need to understand that your facial expressions are important. Leaders sometimes are not focused on how they are sharing their expressions with others when speaking with staff members. Please take a look why this all matters, and how you realize that non-verbal communication often provides a receiver with information that many not make them happy. Take a look at how I respond in the video!

item.title: Leveraging Python in R to use the Neo4j Bolt driver
item.description: Neo4j in the language R I have been fortunate to work with the Neo4j graph database using the language R over the last two years. A former data scientist that worked for Neo4j, Nicole White, implemented the package RNeo4j and released it in 2015. This solution enabled R developers and data scientists to access the Neo4j database in the R language. The package uses the Neo4j REST API and then process the data in a data.

item.title: Native Graph Database, Neo4j, improves Healthcare
item.description: Data are one of the most import resources in Healthcare to enable the Triple Aim. If you not familiar with the triple aim, it is focused on: Better Health Better Care Lower Cost Better health means that your organization and you are working on finding ways to create a better experience for the healthcare population that you support. Better care requires that you are delivering care at the highest level.
